name: Sexting Group TG
tagline: Active sexting and flirting group with verification system
description: Sexting Group TG is a large Telegram group focused on sexting and flirting between verified adults. The group requires photo verification to join, reducing fake profiles and catfishing. The group maintains a respectful atmosphere despite its explicit nature.
